name: VR Dream Girl
description:
As the cost of 'dating' in the real world becomes more and more expensive, and some groups of humans are also socially intimidated, virtual partners are a great option. In the VR world people find their own 'Dream Girl' and together they can play all sorts of fun 'mini-games' to begin their first emotional experience.
Game features.
A wealth of erotic dialogue and interactive body movements
Wide range of interactive toys
Fun dialogue
Realistic movement system
Several scenarios to experience
with built-in mini-games
Adult content description
The content is described by the developer as follows：
This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages or should not be accessed during work: nudity or pornographic content, common adult content, all characters in the game are over 18.
